dcterms:description: The CARLA simulator is used for training and evaluating self-driving car models in various weather conditions, providing a platform for online performance testing.

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The Kitti Vision Benchmark Suite provides a comprehensive dataset for evaluating various aspects of autonomous driving, including object detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: Kitti Vision Benchmark Suite

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes Dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:description: The ApolloScape Dataset is aimed at autonomous driving, providing a large-scale dataset with diverse driving scenarios and annotations.

dcterms:description: The 4Seasons Dataset is a cross-season dataset designed for multi-weather SLAM in autonomous driving, providing data across different weather conditions.

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar

dcterms:description: The Oxford RobotCar Dataset consists of a year-long collection of data from a vehicle driving around Oxford, providing a rich dataset for autonomous driving research.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar Dataset
